Gravity Blasters.name: Gravity Blasters
Gravity Blasters.description: Oh, gravity. Thinks it’s so tough, but even an entire planet’s worth can’t beat the static field generated by a balloon rubbed on your little sister’s head. But you gotta love an underdog, and with enough concentrators, exciters, and dilators you can still get this one to bark.
Gravity Blasters.effect: Roll to damage things at a distance with a blast of crushing force (or pummel stuff with non-lethal grav torrents).
Gravity Blasters.look: gauntlet, glove, carbine, pistol, cannon, visor powerpack, orb, wand...

Hardlight Board.name: Hardlight Board
Hardlight Board.description: Create a board made of solid, stable light with this wrist-mounted device. Out of the box, it’s basically just a standard hoverboard you can use as a nightlight, but a good programmer can unlock its true photonic potential. Hold onto your waveforms!
Hardlight Board.effect:
Go fast over solid terrain on a
hoverboard made from crystallized light. Make your board
non-exist and re-exist at will.
Hardlight Board.look: purple city, blue sunset, loud stars, white heat, pink ice, teal god, neon black

Hyperoptic Visor.name: Hyperoptic Visor
Hyperoptic Visor.description: Why have your face glued to your phone when you can have your phone glued to your face? Visors, goggles, and other hands-free consoles are popular among nerds, videographers, and anyone who needs to text while eating a footlong sub.
Hyperoptic Visor.effect: Use an advanced HUD to access information, capture picture and video, send texts, play Ruby Rush, and do everything else you could with a phone.
Hyperoptic Visor.look: goggles, visor, shades, glasses, eyepiece, mask, helmet, contact lenses

Kinetic Deck.name: Kinetic Deck
Kinetic Deck.description: Inertial sweepers and momentum cells have been standard in hoverboards for years, allowing higher top speeds for classic kick-push decks. Only recently have slugblasters discovered that a little ballast-modification can break the laws of hoverboard physics completely.
Kinetic Deck.effect: Go fast over solid terrain. Make your board super heavy at will, either as an effective attack or to protect it from theft.

Negafriction Sword.name: Negafriction Sword
Negafriction Sword.description: Negafriction is just what it sounds like: complete nonsense. Normally, friction converts kinetic energy into heat, causing objects to slow down and get warmer. But negafriction swords speed up and get cooler. Just like you!
Negafriction Sword.effect: Roll to slice, dice, chop, and stab things (or non-lethally smack them with the kineticallycharged sheath).
Negafriction Sword.look: ancient, futuristic, modern, hardlight, katana, scimitar, longsword, carbon fibre

Photonic Jacket.name: Photonic Jacket
Photonic Jacket.description: Metamaterial clothing has been working hard to keep kids’ atoms intact since slugblasting started, but Miper’s Billy Blazer® and similar photonic jackets have taken the scene by storm. Blend into the scenery, stand out from the crowd, and stay alive more to thrive more.
Photonic Jacket.effect: Display colours, patterns, and images on the fabric’s surface. Also, nope slams from lasers and other electromagnetic energy for only 1 trouble.
Photonic Jacket.look: blazer, bomber, denim, leather, hoodie, trench, coveralls, raincoat windbreaker

Powered Armour.name: Powered Armour
Powered Armour.description: 3D-printed armour, repurposed exoskeletons, and Slipmarket battle suits didn’t hit the scene until fairly recently, but their modular frameworks make them perfect for creative slugblasters looking to do something bespoke and original.
Powered Armour.effect: Nope slams from falls, crushing, hits, and other kinetic damage for only 1 trouble. Don and doff fast via an automated process.
Powered Armour.look: flashy, utilitarian, mining exo, combat jacket, skinsuit, hardsuit, post-motocross...

Reality Cannon.name: Reality Cannon
Reality Cannon.description: If you shine light through a kramshon crystal, you see a brand new colour. If you fire a high-powered beam of coherent photons through a kramshon crystal, you can scramble reality itself. And guess what! Most things, including monsters, are made of reality! Have fun!
Reality Cannon.effect: Roll to scramble things with a powerful reality beam (either destructive and permanent, or unpleasant and temporary).
Reality Cannon.look: gauntlet, glove, carbine, pistol, cannon, visor, powerpack, orb, wand...

Riftninja Sneakers.name: Riftninja Sneakers
Riftninja Sneakers.description: Riftninja sneakers are branded as performance-wear for pro-level capture-the-flag athletes, hoping to distance themselves from their core market of graffiti artists, vandals, thieves, and kids trying to sneak out of the house.
Riftninja Sneakers.effect: Use astral phasing to become slightly not here, ghostly and ethereal, which can help you sneak around.
Riftninja Sneakers.look: hi-tops, low-tops, mids, slip-ons, boots, hikers, flats, platforms, laserblades...

Robotic Companion.name: Robotic Companion
Robotic Companion.description: Loners, geniuses, and kids with too much love to give all inevitably create signature devices capable of feeling things. Is it a hovering companion drone, a lumbering utility mech, an inflatable personal healthcare assistant, or something else?
Robotic Companion.effect: As smart and loyal as a dog. Can follow closely, lift and carry things you could, communicate vaguely, and you can roll to have it do simple tasks, like fetch.
Robotic Companion.look: android, mech, drone, quadruped, biped, rolling, hovering, metal, plastic...

Skipmode Runners.name: Skipmode Runners
Skipmode Runners.description: Skip boring. Skip average. Skip to the good part with Skipmode runners. The commercial shows a kid fast-forwarding through his homework, but everyone knew it was just clever marketing for a fairly average modular shoe. Until sluggers got ahold of them...
Skipmode Runners.effect: Use your powered midsoles to run, jump, and slide super fast, easily keeping up with your pals on hoverboards.
Skipmode Runners.look: hi-tops, low-tops, mids, slip-ons, boots, hikers, flats, platforms, laserblades...

Voidwear Backpack.name: Voidwear Backpack
Voidwear Backpack.description: The back-breaking sport of shoulder-hoarding was transformed by Miper’s iconic, ubiquitous Voidwear® backpack, which uses [stolen] proprietary shipping technology to allow you to carry the contents of your bedroom in a simple 1-pocket cinch.
Voidwear Backpack.effect: Store any amount of objects smaller than a person in your bag’s pocket dimension. Roll to see if you happen to have a specific everyday item in there.
Voidwear Backpack.look: nylon, canvas, denim, leather, plastic, hardlight, mirage-weave, satchel
